statements: SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 18
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE age < 30
SELECT first_name, last_name, health_condition FROM Students WHERE health_condition IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT student_id, first_name, medical_needs FROM Students WHERE medical_needs LIKE '%allergy%'
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE health_condition IS NOT NULL
SELECT last_name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE first_name = 'John' AND health_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_age > 10;
SELECT student_id, student_name, medical_condition FROM students WHERE medical_condition IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY checkup_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, height, weight, doctor_comments FROM students JOIN health_records ON students.student_id = health_records.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_age > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE height > 150 AND weight < 60 ORDER BY checkup_date DESC
SELECT student_name, allergies FROM students WHERE medical_condition='Asthma' AND emergency_contact IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM medication_records WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT student_name, doctor_comments FROM students JOIN health_records ON students.student_id = health_records.student_id WHERE doctor_comments LIKE '%healthy%'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT parent_name, medical_condition FROM students WHERE medical_condition IS NOT NULL;
SELECT record_type, diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE record_type = 'Checkup';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE medical_condition IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, parent_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_type = 'Checkup' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, record_type, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM students s JOIN medical_records mr ON s.student_id = mr.student_id WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE frequency = 'Daily' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 10;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT nurse_name, specialty FROM Nurses WHERE specialty = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT student_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Students JOIN HealthRecords ON Students.student_id = HealthRecords.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 18 AND health_condition LIKE '%asthma%';
SELECT parent_name, email FROM Parents WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT nurse_name, specialty FROM Nurses WHERE nurse_id IN (SELECT nurse_id FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu');
SELECT Students.student_name, HealthRecords.visit_date FROM Students INNER JOIN HealthRecords ON Students.student_id = HealthRecords.student_id ORDER BY visit_date DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name, location FROM classes WHERE teacher_id = 5;
SELECT full_name, specialization FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE student_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY full_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2005-12-31';

SELECT c.class_name, t.full_name AS teacher_name, s.full_name AS student_name FROM classes c JOIN teachers t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id JOIN students s ON s.student_id = c.class_id ORDER BY c.class_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT h.health_condition, h.last_checkup, m.medication_name FROM health_records h JOIN medications m ON h.student_id = m.student_id WHERE h.last_checkup < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY h.last_checkup DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.full_name AS student_name, h.health_record FROM students s LEFT JOIN health_records h ON s.student_id = h.student_id WHERE h.health_record IS NOT NULL LIMIT 5;
